titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation prohibiting the keeping of the fair at Bristol, commonly called St. Paul's Fair
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfeild ... for John Bill, and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, the one and twentieth day of December, 1665. In the seventeenth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
